question: [File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/token_models/tokens.rs] [Function: from_write_table_item()] [Amount Validation] The ensure_not_negative() call converts negative to zero - does this silently hide accounting errors where tokens should never have negative amounts in the first place?
